actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE users
SET       
    name = '{{inp_name.text}}',                      
    image = '{{inp_image.model.image}}',                 
    phoneno = '{{inp_phone.text}}',            
    email = '{{inp_email.text}}', 
		gender = '{{inp_gender.selectedOptionValue}}',
		community_id = '{{inp_comid.text}}',
		role = '{{inp_role.selectedOptionValue}}',
		dob = {{inp_dob.selectedDate ? `'${inp_dob.selectedDate}'` : NaN }},
    location = '{{inp_location.text}}',                  
    about = '{{inp_about.text}}'            
WHERE user_id = {{JSON.parse(appsmith.URL.queryParams.member).user_id}};
